application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of Planning Conditions 4 (Landscaping Plan), Condition 11 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), Condition 12 (Secure Cycle Parking) and Condition 14 (Fire Safety Strategy) of Planning Permission ref: 22/01897/FUL (Erection of two storey side and single storey rear extension with accommodation on roof space, conversion of existing semi-detached dwelling to 2nos 3 bed terrace houses with associated parking, cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping)
decision_conditions: The submitted Fire Safety Strategy has been submitted but this does not include an adequate Statement of Competence. As such, the strategy does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12 of the London Plan (2021) and so this condition cannot be discharged.

The siting of the cycle store in the front garden area is not considered appropriate and, in combination with the refuse and recycle store and off street parking, will result in unacceptable visual clutter in the streetscene. No consideration has been given to siting the cycle parking in the rear garden (where possible). The details submitted are not deemed acceptable and this condition cannot be discharged.

The landscape plan does not include details of paving materials, number of plants and details of species or maintenance details. As such, the details of this condition have not been satisfied and this condition cannot be discharged.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
